word:
My whole being longs after the Lord. I am not content to be satisfied with occasional flashes of light. I must have more. "If any man thirst," Christ said, "let him come unto Me, and drink" [John 7:37]. "The water that I shall 


                                    -293- 

give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life" (John 4:14).
